entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023
